prod_short_desc: Help toys feel better in Doc McStuffins™’ Backyard Clinic!
prod_long_desc:
The Doc is in! Help Doc McStuffins™ and friends Lambie and Stuffy look after all her toys in the Backyard Clinic! Susie Sunshine is sick and needs Doc to make her feel better. Time for check-up with the medical tools to find out what the problem is. Lambie is on hand to pass a blanket or a bandage if they are needed. The special two-sided decorated brick can be turned around to show Susie sick and then when she is cured. When Doc’s work is done for the day, it’s time to play on the slide with allher friends! This LEGO® DUPLO® brand Doc McStuffins set provides endless role-play opportunities for young children to treat injured toys, while encouraging early construction skills through building and rebuilding the clinic.
Build your own Doc McStuffins Backyard Clinic, featuring drawer, sink, window and door, plus decorated Susie Sunshine brick!
Includes Doc McStuffins DUPLO figure, plus Lambie and Stuffy
LEGO DUPLO Doc McStuffins brick building toys are compatible with all other LEGO DUPLO construction sets for creative building
Backyard Clinic measures over 7" high, 8" wide and 6" long
39 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 2 and 5 years old
